item.title: B2B Trade Store
item.description: Custom HTML Welcome Page Create your own Custom HTML Welcome page for your Trade store or use the available Templates provided by Stock2Shop. Add a custom logo to the footer of your Navigation panel. State the Terms of your Store in the checkout The checkout field can contain custom Terms that need to be agreed upon by the customer to proceed with the Order. Show units available Display how much quantity is left of a specific product.
